creator: sheldon.robinson@gmail.com
text:
Updated the FaultCode.java with FaultCode to XDB error code mappings and added
method getErrorCode from a faultcode

Created attachment 19068
FaultCode to ErrorCode mappings
creator: sheldon.robinson@gmail.com
vgritsenko@apache.org
text: What's the purpose of these mappings?

creator: sheldon.robinson@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> What's the purpose of these mappings?
The are the mappings for Xindice fault codes to XMLDB error codes.  This will
allow the user to the standard error for the XMLDB specs instead of vendor
specific fault codes in  their applications.

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
patch applied with the exception of new error codes - since they are not used in
xindice, I don't see a need to add them. thanks.
